verses.verse: Moreover he said <WH559> to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> eat <WH398> that you find; <WH4672> eat <WH398> this <WH2063> roll, <WH4040> and go <WH3212> speak <WH1696> to the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

And he said <WH559> to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> go, <WH3212> get <WH935> you to the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> and speak <WH1696> with my words <WH1697> to them.
For you are not sent <WH7971> to a people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of an hard <WH3515> language, <WH3956> but to the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478>

Not to many <WH7227> people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of an hard <WH3515> language, <WH3956> whose <WH834> words <WH1697> you can not understand. <WH8085> Surely, <WH518> <WH3808> had I sent <WH7971> you to them, they would have listened <WH8085> to you.

But the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> will <WH14> not listen <WH8085> to you; for they will <WH14> not listen <WH8085> to me: for all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> are impudent <WH2389> <WH4696> and hardhearted. <WH7186> <WH3820>
Behold, <WH2009> I have made <WH5414> your face <WH6440> strong <WH2389> against <WH5980> their faces, <WH6440> and your forehead <WH4696> strong <WH2389> against <WH5980> their foreheads. <WH4696>

As an adamant <WH8068> harder <WH2389> than flint <WH6864> have I made <WH5414> your forehead: <WH4696> fear <WH3372> them not, neither <WH3808> be dismayed <WH2865> at their looks, <WH6440> though they be a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>

Moreover he said <WH559> to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> all <WH3605> my words <WH1697> that I shall speak <WH1696> to you receive <WH3947> in your heart, <WH3824> and hear <WH8085> with your ears. <WH241>

And go, <WH3212> get <WH935> you to them of the captivity, <WH1473> to the children <WH1121> of your people, <WH5971> and speak <WH1696> to them, and tell <WH559> them, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> whether <WH518> they will hear, <WH8085> or whether <WH518> they will forbear. <WH2308>

Then the spirit <WH7307> took <WH5375> me up, and I heard <WH8085> behind <WH310> me a voice <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing, <WH7494> saying, Blessed <WH1288> be the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> from his place. <WH4725>

I heard <WH8085> also the noise <WH6963> of the wings <WH3671> of the living <WH2416> creatures <WH2416> that touched <WH5401> one <WH802> another, <WH269> and the noise <WH6963> of the wheels <WH212> over <WH5980> against <WH5980> them, and a noise <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing. <WH7494>

So the spirit <WH7307> lifted <WH5375> me up, and took <WH3947> me away, and I went <WH3212> in bitterness, <WH4751> in the heat <WH2534> of my spirit; <WH7307> but the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was strong <WH2388> on me.

Then I came <WH935> to them of the captivity <WH1473> at Telabib, <WH8512> that dwelled <WH3427> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar, <WH3529> and I sat <WH3427> where <WH8033> they sat, <WH3427> and remained <WH3427> there <WH8033> astonished <WH8074> among <WH8432> them seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>
And it came <WH1961> to pass at the end <WH7097> of seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> that the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> I have made <WH5414> you a watchman <WH6822> to the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> therefore hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> at my mouth, <WH6310> and give them warning <WH2094> from me.

When I say <WH559> to the wicked, <WH7563> You shall surely die; <WH4191> and you give him not warning, <WH2094> nor <WH3808> speak <WH1696> to warn <WH2094> the wicked <WH7563> from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH1870> to save <WH2421> his life; <WH2421> the same <WH1931> wicked <WH7563> man shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity; <WH5771> but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at your hand. <WH3027>

Yet if <WH3588> you warn <WH2094> the wicked, <WH7563> and he turn <WH7725> not from his wickedness, <WH7562> nor from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH1870> he shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity; <WH5771> but you have delivered <WH5337> your soul. <WH5315>

Again, <WH7725> When a righteous <WH6662> man does turn <WH7725> from his righteousness, <WH6664> and commit <WH6213> iniquity, <WH5766> and I lay <WH5414> a stumbling-block <WH4383> before <WH6440> him, he shall die: <WH4191> because <WH3588> you have not given him warning, <WH2094> he shall die <WH4191> in his sin, <WH2403> and his righteousness <WH6666> which <WH834> he has done <WH6213> shall not be remembered; <WH2142> but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at your hand. <WH3027>

Nevertheless if <WH3588> you warn <WH2094> the righteous <WH6662> man, that the righteous <WH6662> sin <WH2398> not, and he does not sin, <WH2398> he shall surely live, <WH2421> because <WH3588> he is warned; <WH2094> also you have delivered <WH5337> your soul. <WH5315>

And the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was there <WH8033> on me; and he said <WH559> to me, Arise, <WH6965> go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> into <WH413> the plain, <WH1237> and I will there <WH8033> talk <WH1696> with you.

Then I arose, <WH6965> and went <WH3318> forth <WH3318> into <WH413> the plain: <WH1237> and, behold, <WH2009> the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> stood <WH5975> there, <WH8033> as the glory <WH3519> which <WH834> I saw <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar: <WH3529> and I fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> my face. <WH6440>

Then the spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> into me, and set <WH5975> me on my feet, <WH7272> and spoke <WH1696> with me, and said <WH559> to me, Go, <WH935> shut <WH5462> yourself within <WH8432> your house. <WH1004>
But you, O son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> behold, <WH2009> they shall put <WH5414> bands <WH5688> on you, and shall bind <WH631> you with them, and you shall not go <WH3318> out among <WH8432> them:

And I will make your tongue <WH3956> sticks <WH1692> to the roof <WH2441> of your mouth, <WH2441> that you shall be dumb, <WH481> and shall not be to them a reprover: <WH3198> for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>
